data.Sentence_cn: 贾斯珀.怀特是少有的相信古代神话的人之一。
data.Sentence: Jasper White is one of those rare people who believes in ancient myths.

data.Sentence_cn: 他刚在城里买下一所新房子，
data.Sentence: he has just bought a new house in the city,

data.Sentence_cn: 但自从搬进去后，就和汽车及车主们发生了摩擦。
data.Sentence: but ever since he moved in, he has had trouble with cars and their owners.

data.Sentence_cn: 当他夜里回到家时，总是发现有人把车停在他家大门外。
data.Sentence: When he returns home at night, he always finds that someone has parked a car outside his gate.

data.Sentence_cn: 为此，他甚至一次也没能把自己的车开进车库。
data.Sentence: Because of this, he has not been able to get his own car into his garage even once.

data.Sentence_cn: 贾斯珀曾把几块“禁止停车”的牌子挂在大门外边，但没有任何效果。
data.Sentence: Jasper has put up 'No Parking' signs outside his gate, but these have not had any effect.

data.Sentence_cn: 现在他把一个丑陋的石雕头像放在了大门上边，
data.Sentence: Now he has put an ugly stone head over the gate.

data.Sentence_cn: 这是我见过的最丑陋的头像之一。
data.Sentence: It is one of the ugliest faces I have ever seen.

data.Sentence_cn: 我问他那是什么？他告诉我那是蛇发女怪美杜莎。
data.Sentence: I asked him what it was and he told me that it was Medusa, the Gorgon.

data.Sentence_cn: 贾斯珀希望她把汽车和车主们都变成石头。
data.Sentence: jasper hopes that she will turn cars and their owners to stone.

data.Sentence_cn: 但到目前为止还没有一个变成石头呢！
data.Sentence: But none of them has been turned to stone yet!
